Translations.Text: Kaya amhi tumhala tuccha panya (virya) pasuna nirmana kele nahi
Maga amhi tyasa majabuta (ani suraksita) sthani thevale
Eka nirdharita vele paryarnta
Maga amhi anumana lavale, tara amhi kiti cangale anumana lavanare ahota
Tya divasi khote tharavinaryansathi vinasa ahe
Kaya amhi jaminila sancayita karanari nahi banavile
Jivanta asalelyannahi ani melelyannahi
Ani amhi ticyata unca (ani vajanadara) parvata banavile, ani tumhala sincita karanare goda pani pajale
Tya divasi khote tharavinaryansathi vinasa ahe
Tya (jahannama) kade ja, jila tumhi khote tharavita hote
Cala tya savalikade, jila tina sakha aheta
Ji vastavika na chaya denari ahe ani na jvalapasuna vacavu sakate
Nihsansaya, (jahannama) mahalasarakhya cingarya phekate
Janu kahi te pivale unta aheta
Tya divasi khote tharavinaryansathi durdasa (vinasa) ahe
Aja (ca divasa) asa divasa ahe ki te boluhi sakanara nahita
Na tyanna sababa mandanyaci anumati dili ja'ila
Tya divasi khote tharavinaryanci duhsthiti (kharabi) ahe
Ha ahe phaisalyaca divasa. Amhi tumhala ani purvi ho'una gelelya lokanna (sarvanna) ekatrita kele ahe
Tevha jara tumhi majhyasi ekhadi cala khelu sakata asala tara kheluna paha
Duhkha ahe tya divasi khote tharavinaryankarita
Nihsansaya, neka sadacari loka savalita asatila ani vahatya jharyammadhye
Ani tya phalammadhye, jyanci te iccha karatila
(He jannatamadhye rahanaryanno!) Majeta kha ani pya, apalya krta-karmancya mobadalyata
Nihsansaya, amhi satkarma (neki) karanaryanna asaca prakare mobadala pradana karato
Tya divasi khote tharavinaryankarita mothe duhkha ahe
(He khote tharavinaryanno!) Tumhi (ya jagata) thode kha'una pi'una ghya ani labha prapta karuna ghya. Niscitaca tumhi aparadhi ahata
Tya divasi khote tharavinaryansathi vinasa ahe
Tyanna jevha sangitale jate ki ruku'a kara (jhuka) tara karita nahi
Tya divasi khote tharavinaryanca vinasa ahe
Ata ya (kura'ana) nantara konatya gostivara imana rakhatila
